examples.example: 每天一家人围坐在一起开开心心地吃饭，真是幸福又温馨。

translate.english: Every day, the whole family sitting around and eating happily together is really happy and warm.

examples.example: 我邀请朋友一起去餐厅吃饭，享受愉快的相聚时光。

translate.english: I invite friends to go to the restaurant to eat together and enjoy the pleasant time of getting together.

examples.example: 每次到了吃饭时间，大家就会欢快地聚在一起，共享美味与欢乐。

translate.english: Every time when it is time to eat, everyone will gather happily together to share the deliciousness and joy.
